text: The 2016–17 season is the Al-Hilal Saudi Football Club's 60th in existence and 41st consecutive season in the top flight of Saudi Arabian football. Along with Pro League, the club also competes in the AFC Champions League, Super Cup, Crown Prince Cup and the King Cup. ==Players== ===Squad information=== Players and squad numbers last updated on 31 January 2017. Note: Flags indicate national team as has been defined under FIFA eligibility rules.
